b-alert.description: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages.

b-badge.description: Small and adaptive tag for adding context to just about any content.

b-breadcrumb.description: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy. Separators are automatically added in CSS through ::before and content.

b-breadcrumb-item.description: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy. Separators are automatically added in CSS through ::before and content.

b-button.description: Use BootstrapVue's <b-button> component for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

b-btn.description:
Use BootstrapVue's <b-button> component for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

*Alias for BButton*

b-button-close.description: Use BootstrapVue's <b-button> component for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

b-btn-close.description:
Use BootstrapVue's <b-button> component for actions in forms, dialogs, and more. Includes support for a handful of contextual variations, sizes, states, and more.

*Alias for BButtonClose*

b-button-group.description: Group a series of buttons together on a single line with <b-button-group>.

b-btn-group.description:
Group a series of buttons together on a single line with <b-button-group>.

*Alias for BButtonGroup*

b-button-toolbar.description: Group a series of <b-button-group> and/or <b-input-group> together on a single line, with optional keyboard navigation.

b-btn-toolbar.description:
Group a series of <b-button-group> and/or <b-input-group> together on a single line, with optional keyboard navigation.

*Alias for BButtonToolbar*

b-card.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-header.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-footer.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-body.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-title.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-sub-title.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-img.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-img-lazy.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-text.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-card-group.description: A card is a flexible and extensible content container. It includes options for headers and footers, a wide variety of content, contextual background colors, and powerful display options.

b-carousel.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of content, built with CSS 3D transforms. It works with a series of images, text, or custom markup.

b-carousel-slide.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of content, built with CSS 3D transforms. It works with a series of images, text, or custom markup.

b-collapse.description: Easily toggle content visibility on your pages. Includes support for making accordions.

b-dropdown.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdown*

b-dropdown-item.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-item.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdownItem*

b-dropdown-item-btn.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-item-button.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdownItemButton*

b-dd-item-btn.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdownItemButton*

b-dropdown-divider.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-divider.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dropdown-form.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-form.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dropdown-text.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dropdown-group.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-group.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdownGroup*

b-dropdown-header.description: Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

b-dd-header.description:
Dropdowns are toggleable, contextual overlays for displaying lists of links and actions in a dropdown menu format.

*Alias for BDropdownHeader*

b-embed.description: Create responsive video or slideshow embeds based on the width of the parent by creating an intrinsic ratio that scales on any device.

b-form.description: Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

b-form-text.description: Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

b-form-invalid-feedback.description: Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

b-form-valid-feedback.description: Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

b-form-datalist.description: Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

b-datalist.description:
Form component and form helper components that optionally supports inline form styles and validation states

*Alias for BFormDatalist*

b-form-checkbox-group.description: Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

b-checkbox-group.description:
Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

*Alias for BFormCheckboxGroup*

b-check-group.description:
Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

*Alias for BFormCheckboxGroup*

b-form-checkbox.description: Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

b-checkbox.description:
Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

*Alias for BFormCheckbox*

b-check.description:
Custom checkbox input and checkbox group to replace the browser default checkbox input, built on top of semantic and accessible markup. Optionally supports switch styling.

*Alias for BFormCheckbox*

b-form-file.description: Customized, cross-browser consistent, file input control that supports single file, multiple files, and directory upload.

b-file.description:
Customized, cross-browser consistent, file input control that supports single file, multiple files, and directory upload.

*Alias for BFormFile*

b-form-group.description: Easily add some structure to forms. Its purpose is to pair form controls with a legend or label, and to provide help text and invalid/valid feedback text, as well as visual (color) contextual state feedback.

b-form-input.description: Create various type inputs such as: text, password, number, url, email, search, range, date and more.

b-input.description:
Create various type inputs such as: text, password, number, url, email, search, range, date and more.

*Alias for BFormInput*

b-form-radio-group.description: Cross browser consistent radio inputs and radio groups, using Bootstrap's custom radio input to replace the browser default radio input.

b-radio-group.description:
Cross browser consistent radio inputs and radio groups, using Bootstrap's custom radio input to replace the browser default radio input.

*Alias for BFormRadioGroup*

b-form-radio.description: Cross browser consistent radio inputs and radio groups, using Bootstrap's custom radio input to replace the browser default radio input.

b-radio.description:
Cross browser consistent radio inputs and radio groups, using Bootstrap's custom radio input to replace the browser default radio input.

*Alias for BFormRadio*

b-form-select.description: Custom <select> component using cross-browser custom styles. Optionally generate <option> entries based on an array, array of objects.

b-select.description:
Custom <select> component using cross-browser custom styles. Optionally generate <option> entries based on an array, array of objects.

*Alias for BFormSelect*

b-form-textarea.description: Create multi-line text inputs with support for auto height sizing, minimum and maximum number of rows, and contextual validation states.

b-textarea.description:
Create multi-line text inputs with support for auto height sizing, minimum and maximum number of rows, and contextual validation states.

*Alias for BFormTextarea*

b-img.description: Create responsive images, optionally adding lightweight styles to them — all via props. Support for rounded images, thumbnail styling, alignment, and even the ability to create blank images with an optional solid background color, and lazy loaded images.

b-img-lazy.description: Create responsive images, optionally adding lightweight styles to them — all via props. Support for rounded images, thumbnail styling, alignment, and even the ability to create blank images with an optional solid background color, and lazy loaded images.

b-input-group.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs.

b-input-group-prepend.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs.

b-input-group-append.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs.

b-input-group-text.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs.

b-input-group-addon.description: Easily extend form controls by adding text, buttons, or button groups on either side of textual inputs.

b-jumbotron.description: A lightweight, flexible component that can optionally extend the entire viewport to showcase key marketing messages on your site.

b-container.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

b-row.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

b-col.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

b-form-row.description: Use the powerful mobile-first flexbox grid (via the <b-container>, <b-row>, <b-form-row> and <b-col> components) to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, CSS Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

b-link.description: Use BootstrapVue's custom <b-link> component for generating a standard <a> link or <router-link>. <b-link> supports the disabled state and click event propagation.

b-list-group.description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. List group items can be modified to support just about any content within. They can also be used as navigation via various props.

b-list-group-item.description: List groups are a flexible and powerful component for displaying a series of content. List group items can be modified to support just about any content within. They can also be used as navigation via various props.

b-media.description: The media object helps build complex and repetitive components where some media is positioned alongside content that doesn't wrap around said media.

b-media-aside.description: The media object helps build complex and repetitive components where some media is positioned alongside content that doesn't wrap around said media.

b-media-body.description: The media object helps build complex and repetitive components where some media is positioned alongside content that doesn't wrap around said media.

b-modal.description: Modals are streamlined, but flexible dialog prompts powered by JavaScript and CSS. They support a number of use cases from user notification to completely custom content and feature a handful of helpful sub-components, sizes, variants, accessibility, and more.

b-nav.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

b-nav-item.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

b-nav-text.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

b-nav-form.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

b-nav-item-dropdown.description: Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

b-nav-item-dd.description:
Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

*Alias for BNavItemDropdown*

b-nav-dropdown.description:
Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

*Alias for BNavItemDropdown*

b-nav-dd.description:
Navigation components that share general markup and styles, from the base <b-nav> class to the active and disabled states. Swap modifier props to switch between each style.

*Alias for BNavItemDropdown*

b-navbar.description: The component <b-navbar> is a responsive wrapper that positions branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise header. It's easily extensible and thanks to the <b-collapse> component.

b-navbar-nav.description: The component <b-navbar> is a responsive wrapper that positions branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise header. It's easily extensible and thanks to the <b-collapse> component.

b-navbar-brand.description: The component <b-navbar> is a responsive wrapper that positions branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise header. It's easily extensible and thanks to the <b-collapse> component.

b-navbar-toggle.description: The component <b-navbar> is a responsive wrapper that positions branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise header. It's easily extensible and thanks to the <b-collapse> component.

b-nav-toggle.description:
The component <b-navbar> is a responsive wrapper that positions branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise header. It's easily extensible and thanks to the <b-collapse> component.

*Alias for BNavbarToggle*

b-pagination.description: Quick first, previous, next, last, and page buttons for pagination control of another component (such as <b-table> or lists).

b-pagination-nav.description: Quick first, previous, next, last, and page buttons for navigation based pagination, supporting regular links or router links.

b-popover.description: The Popover feature provides a tooltip-like behavior, can be easily applied to any interactive element via the <b-popover> component or v-b-popover directive

b-progress.description: A custom progress component for displaying simple or complex progress bars, featuring support for horizontally stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

b-progress-bar.description: A custom progress component for displaying simple or complex progress bars, featuring support for horizontally stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

b-spinner.description: The <b-spinner> component can be used to show the loading state in your projects. They're rendered only with basic HTML and CSS as a lightweight Vue functional component.

b-table.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-table-lite.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-table-simple.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-tbody.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-thead.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-tfoot.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-tr.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-td.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-th.description: For displaying tabular data. <b-table> supports pagination, filtering, sorting, custom rendering, events, and asynchronous data. For simple display of tabular data without all the fancy features, BootstrapVue also provides lightweight alternative components <b-table-lite> and <b-table-simple>

b-tabs.description: Create a widget of tabbable panes of local content. The tabs component is built upon navs and cards internally, and provides full keyboard navigation control of the tabs.

b-tab.description: Create a widget of tabbable panes of local content. The tabs component is built upon navs and cards internally, and provides full keyboard navigation control of the tabs.

b-toast.description: Push notifications to your visitors with a toast, a lightweight and easily customizable alert message.

b-toaster.description: Push notifications to your visitors with a toast, a lightweight and easily customizable alert message.

b-tooltip.description: Easily add tooltips to elements or components via the <b-tooltip> component or v-b-tooltip directive.
